title.narrative: PRESCHOOL:INCLUSIVE QUALITY EDUCATION

description.narrative: Capacities of ministries and preschool institutions to insrease preschool enrolment and to provide access to quality ECE and ECI services for most vulenerable girls and boys, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, an increased number of girls and boys have access to and participate in better quality and inclusive education, including Roma children and boys and girls with disabilities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacities of ministries and preschool institutions to insrease preschool enrolment and to provide access to quality ECE and ECIservices for most vulenerable girls and boys

description.narrative: During the extended preschool closure due to the COVID-19 pandemic children continued learning about viruses, hygiene and preventive measures by watching 6 TV shows called ‘Kids Scientists’, featuring children and popular puppets, broadcast widely with a total reach of 700,000. The Roma Early Years Network providing direct assistance to Roma families and supported teachers and community workers to ensure online learning of Roma children. Almost 16,000 children in 103 kindergartens were provided with liquid soap and hand sanitizer as part of the COVID-19 response. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021
